trans-unit.source: Creates instances of classes that inherit from the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.Page" /> class and implement the <see cref="T:System.Web.IHttpHandler" /> interface.
trans-unit.target: 建立繼承自 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.Page" /> 類別並實作 <see cref="T:System.Web.IHttpHandler" /> 介面之類別的執行個體。

trans-unit.source: Instances are created dynamically to handle requests for ASP.NET files.
trans-unit.target: 執行個體是動態建立，可以處理 ASP.NET 檔案的要求。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.PageHandlerFactory" /> class is the default handler factory implementation for ASP.NET pages.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.PageHandlerFactory" /> 類別是 ASP.NET 網頁的預設處理常式 Factory 實作。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.PageHandlerFactory> class implements the <xref:System.Web.IHttpHandlerFactory> interface to provide the default HTTP handler for ASP.NET files.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.PageHandlerFactory>類別會實作<xref:System.Web.IHttpHandlerFactory>介面，以提供 ASP.NET 檔案的預設 HTTP 處理常式。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.PageHandlerFactory> calls the ASP.NET compilation system to compile, if necessary, and return the exact type corresponding to the URL, and then creates an instance of that type.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.PageHandlerFactory>呼叫 ASP.NET 編譯系統來編譯時，必要時，並傳回精確的型別對應至的 URL，並接著會建立該類型的執行個體。

trans-unit.source: The page type inherits from the <xref:System.Web.UI.Page> class and implements the <xref:System.Web.IHttpHandler> interface.
trans-unit.target: 頁面類型繼承自<xref:System.Web.UI.Page>類別，並且實作<xref:System.Web.IHttpHandler>介面。

trans-unit.source: To build a custom page handler factory, implement the <xref:System.Web.IHttpHandlerFactory> and register the custom <xref:System.Web.UI.PageHandlerFactory> class in the Web.config file for the application in the [httpHandlers Element (ASP.NET Settings Schema)](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/24ca01f3-7141-4fdc-acac-71c0733cf6c2) configuration section.
trans-unit.target: 若要建置自訂的網頁處理常式 factory 實作<xref:System.Web.IHttpHandlerFactory>並註冊自訂<xref:System.Web.UI.PageHandlerFactory>類別中的應用程式的 Web.config 檔案中[httpHandlers 元素 （ASP.NET 設定結構描述）](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/24ca01f3-7141-4fdc-acac-71c0733cf6c2)組態一節。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.PageHandlerFactory" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.PageHandlerFactory" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.PageHandlerFactory.%23ctor%2A> constructor is the default constructor and initializes any fields to their default values.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.PageHandlerFactory.%23ctor%2A>建構函式是預設建構函式和任何的欄位初始化成為其預設值。

trans-unit.source: An instance of the <see cref="T:System.Web.HttpContext" /> class that provides references to intrinsic server objects (for example, Request, Response, Session, and Server) used to service HTTP requests.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Web.HttpContext" /> 類別的執行個體，提供對內建伺服器物件 (例如，Request、Response、Session 和 Server) 的參考，用以服務 HTTP 要求。

trans-unit.source: The HTTP data transfer method (GET or POST) that the client uses.
trans-unit.target: 用戶端使用的 HTTP 資料傳輸方法 (GET 或 POST)。

trans-unit.source: The virtual path to the requested resource.
trans-unit.target: 所要求之資源的虛擬路徑。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="P:System.Web.HttpRequest.PhysicalApplicationPath" /> property to the requested resource.
trans-unit.target: 所要求之資源的 <see cref="P:System.Web.HttpRequest.PhysicalApplicationPath" /> 屬性。

trans-unit.source: Returns an instance of the <see cref="T:System.Web.IHttpHandler" /> interface to process the requested resource.
trans-unit.target: 傳回 <see cref="T:System.Web.IHttpHandler" /> 介面的執行個體，以處理所要求的資源。

trans-unit.source: A new <see cref="T:System.Web.IHttpHandler" /> that processes the request; otherwise, <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: 會處理要求的新 <see cref="T:System.Web.IHttpHandler" />，否則為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.PageHandlerFactory.GetHandler%2A> method is called by the ASP.NET run time and returns either a valid instance of the <xref:System.Web.IHttpHandler> interface or `null`.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.PageHandlerFactory.GetHandler%2A>方法由 ASP.NET 執行階段呼叫，並傳回其中一個有效的執行個體的<xref:System.Web.IHttpHandler>介面或`null`。

trans-unit.source: Enables a factory to reuse an existing instance of a handler.
trans-unit.target: 允許 Factory 重複使用現有的處理常式執行個體。
